Title: Relates to the reckless use or operation of a vehicle in concert with another
Summary: Includes the reckless use or operation of a vehicle in concert with another as part of the crime of manslaughter in the second degree; clarifies liability as a result of the reckless use or operation of a vehicle in concert with another.
LawCode: Amd ยง125.15, Pen L; add ยง389, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law and the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to the reckless use or operation of a vehicle in concert with another
